div.data-lightboxdescriptioninsidecss: color:#fff; font-size:12px; font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; overflow:hidden; text-align:left; margin:4px 0px 0px; padding: 0px;
div.data-textbgcss: display:block; position:absolute; top:0px; left:0px; width:100%; height:100%; background-color:#333333; opacity:0.6; filter:alpha(opacity=60);
div.data-titlecss: display:block; position:relative; font:bold 14px "Lucida Sans Unicode","Lucida Grande",sans-serif,Arial; color:#fff;
div.data-descriptioncss: display:block; position:relative; font:12px "Lucida Sans Unicode","Lucida Grande",sans-serif,Arial; color:#fff; margin-top:8px;
